name: Wackey Moles
description:
This game was submitted for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1 (theme: holes).

Some moles found a broken keyboard and need your help! 

When a mole shows you a key, press it on your keyboard. 

The moles get faster as the time progresses and you are only allowed to miss three keys. For every key you get right, your score increases by one.

 The keys shown to you are completely random, sometimes more than one identical key will appear. In these cases you just need to press the shown key once, your score will also increase by one for every identical key. 

As long as you don't close the page / quit the game, your highest score will appear with your current score in the end screen!

Thanks for checking out my game, please post your feedback in the comments below and if you want to stay updated follow me:  @psychovanz

:)
